availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph B. Chapline (Hart County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married Eleanor J. Chapline. Father of Emmett H. Chapline and Oscar Chapline. Merchant in Hart County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 215. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Munfordville, District 2, p. 130. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Munfordville, p. 2. Find A Grave, "Joseph B Chapline (1821-1905)," Memorial #146580696, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146580696/joseph-b-chapline (accessed June 5, 2017).
